question: 1. Which of these best describes a substring?

answers.a: A contiguous sequence of characters within a string in any order
answers.b: Contiguous sequence of characters within a string in the same order
answers.c: Any combination of a subset of characters from a string in any order.
answers.d: Any combination of a subset of characters from a string in the same order as the string.

question: 2. Which one of the following is not a prefix of the word 'TIKI-TAKA-TIK-TI'?
3. What does it mean when we say that an algorithm X is asymptotically more efficient than Y?

answers.a: X will always be a better choice for small inputs
answers.b: X will always be a better choice for large inputs
answers.c: Y will always be a better choice for small inputs
answers.d: X will always be a better choice for all inputs

question:
4. int a = 0, b = 0;
for (i = 0; i < N; i++) {
a = a + rand();
}
for (j = 0; j < M; j++) {
b = b + rand();
}
What is the time and space complexity for the above code?

answers.b: O(N + M) time, O(N + M) space
answers.d: O(N * M) time, O(N + M) space
